# optimizationPreference

**Instance Property**

A constant that specifies the graph compilation-optimization preferences.

## Declaration

```swift
var optimizationPreference: BNNSGraph.CompileOptions.OptimizationPreference { get set }
```

## Specifying and querying compilation options

- **useSingleThread**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the graph executes on one thread.
- **generateDebugInfo**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the generated graph includes debug info.
